item.title: Securing Custom Deployments via Travis CI
item.description: Custom Deployment Encrypted Secrets in Build Environment Limiting Deployments From Specific Branches Travis CI - Test and Deploy with Confidence. DEPLOY. D E P L O Y. Travis CI can be used as a publicly hosted deployment system with inbuilt support for deployments to various providers. There are well documented guides about doing the same. But once in a while, one might end up using some service that’s not supported by Travis CI or even a specific feature that’s not supported, although there’s support for the provider.
